attributes.action: Intervene to stop the persecution of Christians in Orissa state of India
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently number of chistians in Orissa state of India were tortured,killed and dislpaced from their homes. Number of churches,homes have been burnt.
Thousands of christian people have been forced to flee from their homes and live in the jungle.
I would like the Prime Minister to request the Indian Government to protect these Christian people in Orissa state of India.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
